Trigger.Regex: (?#-- Dalamud Dive -> Thermionic Beam : Dive & Stack --)Fleeting light! 'Neath the red moon, scorch you the earth!
(?#-- Iron Chariot -> Raven's Dive -> Thermionic Beam : Out & Dive & Stack --)Unbending iron, descend with fiery edge!
(?#-- Iron Chariot -> Thermionic Beam -> Raven's Dive : Out & Stack & Dive --)Unbending iron, take fire and descend!
(?#-- Lunar Dynamo -> Iron Chariot : In & Out --)O hallowed moon, shine you the iron path!
(?#-- Lunar Dynamo -> Iron Chariot -> Raven's Dive : In & Out & Dive --)From hallowed moon I bare iron, in my descent to wield!
(?#-- Lunar Dynamo -> Raven's Dive -> Meteor Stream : In & Dive & Spread --)From hallowed moon I descend, a rain of stars to bring!
(?#-- Lunar Dynamo -> Raven's Dive -> Thermionic Beam : In & Dive & Stack --)From hallowed moon I descend, upon burning earth to tread!
(?#-- Lunar Dynamo -> Thermionic Beam : In & Stack --)O hallowed moon, take fire and scorch my foes!
(?#-- Meteor Stream -> Dalamud Dive : Spread & Dive --)Fleeting light! Amid a rain of stars, exalt you the red moon!
(?#-- Raven's Dive -> Iron Chariot : Dive & Out --)From on high I descend, the iron path to (call|walk)!
(?#-- Raven's Dive -> Lunar Dynamo : Dive & In --)From on high I descend, the hallowed moon to call!
(?#-- Raven's Dive -> Lunar Dynamo -> Meteor Stream : Dive & In & Spread --)From on high I descend, the moon and stars to bring!
(?#-- Thermionic Beam -> Iron Chariot : Stack & Out --)Blazing path, lead me to iron rule!
(?#-- Thermionic Beam -> Lunar Dynamo : Stack & In --)Take fire, O hallowed moon!
